title: My beautiful shwesters
creator_credit: Adam Barolsky, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. He tells a tale of deep sorrow and concern for the welfare of the family he has left behind. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
